sourcesContent:
// src/pages/ConsumptionPage.js (UPDATED CODE) import React from 'react'; /** * Renders the full Consumption Analytics page content. */ const ConsumptionPage = () => { // --- Data for the Consumption Page --- const consumptionMetrics = [ { title: 'TOTAL CONSUMPTION', value: '1385', unit: 'Liters', subText: '1.0% vs last hour', icon: 'üíß', type: 'total' }, { title: 'AVERAGE FLOW', value: '21.9', unit: 'L/min', subText: 'Mean flow rate', icon: 'üåä', type: 'average' }, { title: 'ACTIVE SENSORS', value: '3', unit: 'locations', subText: 'Monitoring points', icon: 'üìä', type: 'active' }, ]; const leakReport = { location: 'kitchen', flowRate: '8.5 L/min', pressure: '28.3 PSI', timestamp: 'Jan 10, 2025, 15:30' }; // Updated Placeholder function for the consumption chart const ConsumptionChartPlaceholder = () => (

24-Hour Consumption Pattern

13:30 · 14:30 · 15:30 · 16:30 · 17:30

); return (

Consumption Analytics

Monitor usage patterns and detect anomalies

{/* Top Metric Cards */}
{consumptionMetrics.map((metric, index) => (

{metric.title}

{metric.icon}

{metric.value} {metric.unit}

{metric.subText}

))}
{/* Chart and Report Row */}

‚ö†Ô∏è Leak Detection Report

üìç

{leakReport.location}

Flow Rate: **{leakReport.flowRate}**

Pressure: **{leakReport.pressure}**

{leakReport.timestamp}

); }; export default ConsumptionPage;
